about_the_game:
🔥 The Glory Dungeon Raider - Demo Out Now! 🔥

The wait is over! You can now try The Glory Dungeon Raider in our free demo on Steam! ⚔️💀

💡 What’s in the demo?
🔹 Experience one intense dungeon stage filled with action and challenges.
🔹 Play with a fixed set of weapons to get a taste of the combat system.
🔹 Face deadly encounters and uncover the thrill of dungeon raiding!

📢 We Need Your Feedback!
This is just the beginning! Your thoughts will help shape the full version—from balancing weapons to enhancing gameplay mechanics. Let us know what you think! Drop a review or comment to make this the best dungeon-raiding experience possible.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Overview:
The Glory Dungeon Raider features fantasy violence and dark themes associated with dungeon exploration. Players engage in combat using melee and ranged weapons against various enemies, including grotesque creatures and supernatural beings.

Violence: Pixel-art combat includes shooting, melee attacks, and enemy defeat animations. No extreme gore or dismemberment.
Dark Themes: The game occurs in eerie dungeon settings with horror-inspired creatures.
No Sexual Content, Drug Use, or Self-Harm: The game does not contain sexual content, drug/alcohol use, or themes of self-harm.
This game is intended for teen and older audiences due to its combat mechanics and dark fantasy atmosphere.

short_description: Enter the depths of a treacherous dungeon in The Glory Dungeon Raider, a fast-paced 2D roguelike where every run is a new challenge! Arm yourself with various weapons, and face off against deadly creatures. Do you have what it takes to survive?
